src/preprocessing/preprocessing.py.title: Unclear comment wording
src/preprocessing/preprocessing.py.details: The comment '# match with underthesea tokenize words' is grammatically incorrect and unclear. It should state the purpose of space-to-underscore replacement in relation to underthesea tokenization formatting.

affected_lines.proposal: # Normalize for compatibility with underthesea tokenization format
affected_lines.affected_code: 11:             line.strip().replace(" ", "_").lower() # match with underthesea tokenize words
